Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the visual effect of floating sky lanterns at the Golden Temple in Amritsar.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or proof to support the existence of the depicted scene.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was digitally created by merging two photographs, rather than being a real photo.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is a genuine representation of the Golden Temple with floating sky lanterns, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the image is a digitally created artwork by a visual artist, rather than a real photograph.
